items.sentence: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
Having finished the delicious meal, Tom and Mary were no longer hungry.
If you'd stop complaining so much, people would probably like you more.
I wasn't able to explain that to Tom in a way that he could understand.
Please come earlier tomorrow. We have a lot of work that we need to do.
A friend is someone who knows everything about you and still likes you.
Back when it was first introduced, the telephone was quite the novelty.
Mary isn't my girlfriend. She's just a friend who happens to be a girl.
I spent three years looking for a good director, but couldn't find one.
Tom was standing in the front of the classroom, talking to the teacher.
